title: How to Make Simplicity Cake

steps.headline: Sift flour, sugar, and cocoa together into a bowl.
Melt the butter gently in a small saucepan.
steps.description: Pour into the cake along with the vanilla. Beat all ingredients together for three minutes.

steps.headline: Pour into a lined cake pan.
steps.description: Place in the oven and bake for 35 minutes.

steps.headline: Remove from oven and cool in pan for 5 minutes, then on a wire cooling rack until cold.

text: Preheat the oven to 180ºC/350ºF.  Sift flour, sugar, and cocoa together into a bowl.  Break eggs on top.  Melt the butter gently in a small saucepan. Pour into the cake along with the vanilla. Beat all ingredients together for three minutes. Pour into a lined cake pan. Place in the oven and bake for 35 minutes. Remove from oven and cool in pan for 5 minutes, then on a wire cooling rack until cold.  Ice with chocolate icing. Decorate with nuts or coconut.
